Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at State/26th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 28th, Wabash, 26th & State, due to police activity near State/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, 28th, Wabash, 26th, then resume their normal route on State; due to police activity near State/26th.

Allow extra travel time.
